# slack_channel (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the Slack channel to look up.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the Slack channel.
- `is_private` (Boolean) Whether the channel is private.
